scripts.start: npm run dev & npm run build & npm run deploy
scripts.build: nodemon --watch main.js --watch to_markdown.js --exec "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js --progress"
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch package.json --watch webpack.config.js --exec "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webpack serve --mode development --progress --hot "
